site_name: West Hendon Estate West HendonLondonNW9
description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 23/1802/FUL dated 19/08/24 for 'Comprehensive redevelopment of the site comprising the demolition of existing buildings and structures and the construction of 8 buildings from 2 to 12 storeys comprising of 350 residential units (Use Class C3), commercial uses (Use Class E), including Health Centre, basement, private and communal amenity space, associated car parking, cycle parking, refuse storage.' Amendments include: Ground Floor Plan - A 2m shift of the building towards the southwest; Elevations - The replacement of Ultra High Performance Concrete (UHPC) cladding panels with brickwork; Roof Level 01 - Extension of the handrail along the entire perimeter; Roof Level 02 - The removal of the back wall in the plant area
